page.title: 07EMLOYMENT IN WITHAM
page.content: Of Witham's workforce quite a large number of people{commute}to Chelmsford and London. In the main these people are white collar workers. During the morning and evening rush hour many trains convey them to and from London.So this means that Witham is partly a dormitory town.Within Witham there are a lot of people employed in{manufacturing industries}.The Crittall Manufacturing Co. Ltd. make metal window frames,greenhouses, etc. & employ the most people.On the two Industrial estates built when the town expanded in the 1960's many things are made including cricket bats,boats, stationery etc.Other people are employed in{agricultural related {industries}such as malting(Bairds), Seed packaging(Hurst Gunson Cooper Tabor), animal feeding stuffs( Nitrovit).Unemployed June 1985=1208.
